Great to see you here! Snap N Go is a system that will assign you small tasks throughout the day that you can get paid for successfully completing! 

 *Each Task* will have:
      •  *Start Time:* when the task starts
      •  *Window:* how long the task will be open for
      •  *Description:* what this task entails
      •  *Compensation ✨:* the money you'll get for successfully completing this task!

 This bot will periodically send you tasks through your DMs for you to either accept or reject.

*Submitting to a Task:*
    *1.* Complete the task's objective 
    *2.* Go to the @TaskBot DM channel here on Slack 
    *3.* Type the task number & attach that task's image (see below)

.  *4.* Send the message!
    *5.* We'll check the task & send back a confirmation! 
            •  This step may take a few minutes

Type and send `?` or `help` to see this information again or for  information about *receiving tasks*, *accepting/rejecting tasks*, other *questions*, or *reporting a bug/recommendation*.

 Thank you again for being part of Snap N Go! We'll send you your first tasks soon!
